name: Check that a number is in range

controls.caption: Invert result
controls.name: invert
controls.description: If set, this function checks, whether the number is OUT the specified range. It is  equivalent to inverting boolean result.

controls.caption: What to do when result is false?
controls.name: actionOnFail
controls.description: If you select "throw exception", this function never returns false; instead, it throws high-level exception (error message for the user).

controls.caption: What output is true
controls.name: booleanStyle
controls.description:
What output string will be returned for true and what for false.

C-like: true is non-zero number or non-empty string, containing not a number, false is 0, 0.0 or empty string.

Java-like: true is "true" string (ignoring case), false is any other string.

Note that "true" string, according these rules, is considered to be true in all modes.
